Focalin XR has been life changing. I am a young model and I travel and fly all the time, so it's great for helping me stay organized. As from any ADHD stimulant medication, I do experience a lot of anxiety,sometimes. For this reason, my doctor also has me on Ativan 1mg which is a benzodiazepine anxiolytic/sedative/musclerelaxer similar to low dose Valium and Xanax. I would highly recommend that anyone with anxiety problems from Focalin XR talk to their DR about adding a small dose of Klonopin or Ativan.
